select distinct coalesce(c.id, brc.existingconstituentid) as ID, br.ID as BATCHROWID, b.ID BATCHID, b.BATCHNUMBER, br.SEQUENCE, c.LOOKUPID as MATCHEDCONSTITUENTLOOKUPID, c.NAME as MATCHEDCONSTITUENTNAME, brc.FIRSTNAME, brc.keyname as LASTNAME, brc.addressblock as DONORADDRESS, brc.city as DONORCITY, STATE.abbreviation as DONORSTATE, brc.postcode as DONORPOSTCODE, country.description as DONORCOUNTRY, br.date as GIFTDATE, br.amount as GIFTAMOUNT, d.VANITYNAME as DESIGNATION, dl.VANITYNAME as DL_DESIGNATION, dl.name as DESIGNATIONLEVELNAME, dl.description as DLDESCRIPTION, dl.userid as DLUSERID, br.paymentmethod as PAYMENTMETHOD, br.CARDHOLDERNAME as NAMEONCARD, CREDITTYPECODE.description as CARDTYPE, br.EXPIRESON as EXPDATE, br.installmentfrequency as RGFREQUENCY, br.INSTALLMENTSCHEDULESEEDDATE as RGDAY, -- actually want the numeric day of the month bbnc.firstpaymentprocessed as RGPROCESSEDFIRSTPAYMENT, br.reference as GIFTCOMMENT, bbnc.pagename as ORIGINPAGE, br.mgmatchingconstituentid as DONORIDAUTOMATCH, bbiscid.value as ATTRIBUTECHILDID, bbissid.value as ATTRIBUTESPONSORID
from BATCHREVENUE br inner join BATCH b on br.batchid = b.id -- using the batch workflow 'BBIS Donation Transaction' to know which batches are revenue from the website inner join BATCHTEMPLATE bt on bt.id = b.batchtemplateid and batchworkflowid = '75261255-7FA1-48DA-95D8-E4F49250C1AA' left join CREDITCARD on CREDITCARD.id = br.creditcardid left join CREDITTYPECODE on CREDITTYPECODE.id = CREDITCARD.CREDITTYPECODEID left join BATCHREVENUECONSTITUENT brc on brc.id = br.constituentid left join STATE on STATE.id = brc.stateid left join COUNTRY on country.id = brc.countryid left join CONSTITUENT c on c.id = br.constituentid left join BATCHREVENUEBBNCINFO bbnc on bbnc.batchrevenueid = br.id left join BATCHREVENUEAPPLICATION bra on bra.batchrevenueid = br.id left join BATCHREVENUEADDITIONALAPPLICATIONS braa on braa.batchrevenueid = br.id left join DESIGNATION d on d.id = braa.designationid left join designationlevel dl on dl.id = designationlevel1id left join BATCHATTRIBUTEB80C76431E65432F8E19AD53F56EB9C9 bbissid on bbissid.id = br.id left join BATCHATTRIBUTEFEDE10805C0045CE88518A4A54BC2975 bbiscid on bbiscid.id = br.id
